issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: HCatalog
components.description: Tracks issues related to the HCatalog

fields.description: We are currently skipping external table replication. We shall also skip listing all the files in create table event generation for external tables. External tables might have very large number of files, so it would take long time to list them.
fields.summary: Skip external table file listing for create table event.

comments.body:
[~maheshk114],

Could you please take a look at the patch?

GitHub user sankarh opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/408

    HIVE-20316: Skip external table file listing for create table event.

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/sankarh/hive HIVE-20316

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/408.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #408
    
----
commit 0c89ab0d5811beeb58800b9f8f66f6f2d6119116
Author: Sankar Hariappan <mailtosankarh@...>
Date:   2018-08-06T09:42:10Z

    HIVE-20316: Skip external table file listing for create table event.

----

ATTACHMENT ID: 12934823 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

shouldnt we do the listing at the time of dump then ? just store the event without the file listing ?

if we dont capture the listing at all then effectively replication for external tables will not work at all ?

[~anishek],

As per discussion with [~thejas], it is decided that we disable file listing for external table always as we currently claim that external table replication is not supported. 

Also, since design for external table replication is in progress and when we finalise it, shall decide if we need to do the listing while repl dump or depend on external module such as HDFS replication.
+1 assuming we are ok with external table no longer working in master , cc [~thejas]

Thanks for the review [~maheshk114] and [~anishek]!

03.patch committed to master.
